alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Meigs; Vinton (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 13 at 11:14PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Meigs, central Gallia, Jackson, Vinton, southwestern Athens and central Lawrence Counties through 1145 PM EDT... At 1112 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Kingston to 10 miles west of Mcarthur to near Jackson to near Franklin Furnace. Movement was northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Athens, Ironton, Jackson, Wellston, Nelsonville, Mcarthur, Oak Hill, Rio Grande, Albany, Lake Hope State Park, Lake Vesuvius, Gallia, Vernon, Waterloo, Hamden, Aid, Coalton, Zaleski, Vinton and Hanging Rock. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in Charleston West Virginia.
